CANCELLATION OF DIVERSION OF TRAINS FOR DOUBLING WORK OVER WEST CENTRAL RAILWAY

Kolkata, April 13, 2022:

In connection with doubling work in Katni â€“ Singrauli section of Jabalpur Division in West Central Railway, Non-interlocking work at Sareigram & Gajara Bahara stations has been planned from 14.04.2022 to 19.04.2022 and the following trains were diverted vide Press Release no. 2022/04/41 dated 11.04.2022. Now it has been decided these diversion will be cancelled and these trains will run as per scheduled route.

Diverted trains as notified earlier which will now run o­n normal route:-

Â·19414 Kolkata â€“ Ahmedabad Express (Journey Commencing o­n 16.04.2022)

Â·19607 Kolkata â€“ Madar Express (Journey Commencing o­n 14.04.2022)

Â·13025 Howrah â€“ Bhopal Express (Journey Commencing o­n 18.04.2022)

DIVERSION OF TRAINS FOR DOUBLING WORK OVER WEST CENTRAL RAILWAY

Kolkata, April 11, 2022:

In connection with doubling work in Katni â€“ Singrauli section of Jabalpur Division in West Central Railway, Non-interlocking work at Sareigram & Gajara Bahara stations has been planned from 14.04.2022 to 19.04.2022.Consequently, 19413 Ahmedabad â€“ Kolkata Express (Journey Commencing o­n 13.04.2022), 19608 Madar â€“ Kolkata Express (Journey Commencing o­n 18.04.2022) will be diverted via Katni Murwara â€“ Satna â€“ Prayagraj Chheoki â€“ Pt. Deen Dayal Upadhyaya â€“ Garhwa Road instead of Katni Murwara â€“ Singrauli â€“ Garhwa Road and 19414 Kolkata â€“ Ahmedabad Express (Journey Commencing o­n 16.04.2022), 19607 Kolkata â€“ Madar Express (Journey Commencing o­n 14.04.2022) & 13025 Howrah â€“ Bhopal Express (Journey Commencing o­n 18.04.2022) will be diverted via Garhwa Road â€“ Pt. Deen Dayal Upadhyaya â€“ Prayagraj Chheoki â€“ Satna â€“ Katni Murwara instead of Garhwa Road â€“ Singrauli â€“ Katni Murwara.

Inconvenience to be caused to the passengers is deeply regretted.
